security_audit.summary: This skill contains only documentation and guidance content with no executable code. It provides helpful information about when to use Claude Code agents, with no security risks detected.

content.user_title: Identify When to Use Claude Code Agents
content.value_statement: Not sure whether to use an agent or direct tools for your task? This skill provides clear guidance on when Claude Code agents are most effective versus when direct tool calls are sufficient.
actual_capabilities: Provides decision criteria for agent vs tool usage
Lists available agent types and their specializations
Offers examples of appropriate agent use cases
limitations: Provides guidance only - no automated decisions
Limited to Claude Code platform agents

use_cases.title: Learn Agent Best Practices
use_cases.description: Understand when agents add value versus using direct tool calls for your coding tasks.

use_cases.title: Optimize Multi-step Workflows
use_cases.description: Determine if your multi-file refactoring or complex search needs warrant agent assistance.

use_cases.title: Train Team on Agent Usage
use_cases.description: Educate your team on proper agent selection for consistent and efficient Claude Code usage.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Task Assessment
prompt_templates.prompt: Should I use an agent to read and edit a specific file, or can I use direct tools?

prompt_templates.title: Complex Search Decision
prompt_templates.prompt: I need to find all API endpoints in my codebase. Should I use the explore agent or search directly?

prompt_templates.title: Multi-file Refactoring
prompt_templates.prompt: I want to rename a function used across 15 files. What's the best approach - agent or direct tools?

prompt_templates.title: Architecture Planning
prompt_templates.prompt: I need to add authentication to my app. Should I use the plan agent or start implementing directly?

output_examples.input: When should I use the explore agent versus searching directly?
output: - You need to understand codebase structure
- You know the exact file location

best_practices: Use agents for unfamiliar codebases or complex searches
Prefer direct tools for simple, single-file operations
Let agents handle multi-step workflows autonomously
anti_patterns: Using agents for simple file reads/writes
Starting with agents before trying direct tools
Assuming agents always provide better results

faq.question: Is this skill compatible with all Claude Code versions?
faq.answer: Yes, the guidance applies to all Claude Code versions that support the agent system.

faq.question: Are there limits to what agents can do?
faq.answer: Agents excel at complex searches and multi-step tasks but may be overkill for simple operations.

faq.question: Can this integrate with my existing workflow?
faq.answer: The skill provides decision guidance that complements any Claude Code workflow without requiring changes.

faq.question: Is my code data safe when using agents?
faq.answer: Agents operate within Claude Code's security model and don't expose your code externally.

faq.question: What if the agent recommendation doesn't work well?
faq.answer: You can always switch approaches - start with direct tools and escalate to agents if needed.

faq.question: How does this compare to other Claude Code skills?
faq.answer: This is a guidance skill that helps you use other skills and tools more effectively.
